str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From pros and a probable derivative of kuon; to fawn or crouch to, i.e. prostrate oneself in homage.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
